participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and spirited, I cherish my vintage horror movie collection and enjoy late-night adventures.
participant_1.background: I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren. I love adrenaline rushes and pushing myself to the limit. I moved to New York to study in a prestigious designing school.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and hands-on, I'm passionate about design and always on the lookout for new projects.
participant_2.background: I'm spending the weekend working on a new 3D model for a video game. I enjoy doing DIY projects in my free time, especially drywall work. I am a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing, while my wife stays home with our kids.

content.text: What are you up to this weekend?
Nothing much, just some DIY projects.
Sounds fun. I'm spending the weekend working on a new 3D model for a video game.
Oh cool! Are you a video game designer?
I'm a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing, but I love doing 3D modeling in my free time.
That's awesome. I'm a recent college graduate too, but I'm still looking for a job in marketing.
I've been applying all over the place, but I haven't had any luck yet.
Keep trying! I'm sure you'll find something soon.
No problem. So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to do DIY projects, play video games, and eat pizza.
Sounds like we have a lot in common. I like to do DIY projects, play video games, and eat pizza too.
That's awesome! We should hang out sometime.
